p: No specific data were provided by the applicant regarding the safety of the additive for users. In the absence of specific data, the FEEDAP PanelÂ cannot conclude on the safety for the users when handling the additive. Distilled lime oil was not irritating or sensitising when tested in volunteers at 15% or 100%. Lime oil is not phototoxic (Dosoky and Setzer, 2018).
